Welcome.Subject: Ahoy, {{username}}! Welcome aboard Wyvern!
Welcome.Title: Welcome aboard, {{username}}!
Welcome.Body: We be mighty glad ye joined th’ Wyvern crew. Let’s get yer berth ready!
Welcome.ActionPrompt: To begin yer voyage, verify yer account, matey:
Welcome.LinkExpiry: This here verification link be good fer 30 minutes.
Welcome.Support: Need a hand? Send a message in a bottle to support@wyvern.gg or visit th’ official Wyvern port.
Welcome.SignOff:
Fair winds n’ rum!
— Th’ Wyvern Crew

Username.Taken: Arrr, that name be claimed by another sailor.
Username.Empty: A name ye must choose, ye can’t sail nameless!
Username.TooShort: Yer name must be at least 2 letters long, lad.
Username.TooLong: Yer name can’t be longer than 15 letters, ye scallywag.
Username.InvalidCharacters: Yer name may only hold letters, numbers, dots, or underlines, aye.
Username.RepeatedSymbols: Ye can’t be stringin’ dots or underlines one after t’other.
Username.ContainsWyvern: Yer name can’t hold th’ word ‘wyvern’. That be forbidden!
Username.BlockedPhrase: Yer name holds a cursed phrase. Change it, or walk the plank!

Password.Empty: Ye can’t set sail without a secret word.
Password.TooShort: Yer secret word must be at least 8 characters, matey.
Password.TooLong: Yer secret word can’t be longer than 64 characters.
Password.MissingUpper: Yer secret word must hold at least one capital letter, arrr!
Password.MissingLower: Yer secret word must hold a wee lowercase letter.
Password.MissingDigit: Yer secret word must contain a number, savvy?
Password.MissingSpecial: Yer secret word must hold a special mark, ye landlubber.

Email.Taken: That email be already spoken for. Try another, sailor.
Email.Empty: An email ye must give, ye can’t leave it empty.
Email.TooLong: Yer email can’t be longer than 320 letters.
Email.InvalidFormat: That email don’t look right, mate.
Email.InvalidSymbol: Yer email must hold a single ‘@’, no more, no less.
Email.UnresolvableDomain: The domain '{domain}' seems cursed n’ uncharted. Try another, or call fer help.

Age.InvalidBirthday: Yer birthday can’t be set in th’ future seas.
Age.TooYoung: Ye must be 13 summers old or more to sail with Wyvern.
Age.Suspicious: Be ye truly {age} years old? If aye, contact th’ crew — we’ll buy ye a cake n’ rum!

Register.VerifyEmailRequired: Almost thar! Check yer chest (inbox) n’ verify yer email to finish joinin’ the crew.
Register.UsernameReserved: This name be reserved by th’ captain.
Register.InvalidInvite: The invite code ye entered be false treasure.
Register.InviteOnly: New sailors board by invite only. Provide a valid code to join, or be gone!
